title: 01/04/21 - DPS - Best Of
itunes:title: 01/04/21 - DPS - Best Of
description:
On today's Dan Patrick Show, Dan and the boys return from break to recap all that's gone down over the past week and a half. Why'd Doug Pederson make the decision to pull Jalen Hurts in the 4th quarter of last night's game? What questions are there about Trevor Lawrence as he looks ahead to the NFL? After snapping their playoff drought, can the Browns make a run? We're joined by NBC's Peter King, ESPN NFL Reporter Sal Paolantonio, ESPN College Football Analyst David Pollack and the PxP voice of the Browns Jim Donovan. Happy New Year!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
